data_table.description: MESA Eye Ancillary Study Dataset: This dataset provides Exam 5 Retinal Photography measures for MESA Classic participants.

variable.name: photora5
variable.comment: If Field 1 or Field 2 Is missing, photos will be incomplete.NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: photola5
variable.comment: If Field 1 or Field 2 Is missing, photos will be incomplete.NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f1ra5
variable.comment: Field 1 is centered on the DISC. IF ABSENT CRAE AND CRVE WILL NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE.NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f1la5
variable.comment: Field 1 is centered on the DISC. IF ABSENT CRAE AND CRVE WILL NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE.NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f2ra5
variable.comment: Field 2 is the Macula and is centered on the fovea. IF ABSENT, AMD AND MACULAR EDEMA MAY NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE. NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f2la5
variable.comment: Field 2 is the Macula and is centered on the fovea. IF ABSENT, AMD AND MACULAR EDEMA MAY NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE.NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: gradra5
variable.comment: THIS ASSUMES AT LEAST ONE DIGITAL IMAGE OF THE RIGHT EYE.0=All fields gradable; 1=Disc ungradable; 2=Portion of macula ungradable; 4= Portion of disc and macula ungradable; 5=Disc and macula ungradable; 6= All available fields ungradable. .SEE MESA DIGITAL GRADING MANUAL OF OPERATIONS (MOP) SECTION 5.1.1 QUALITY OF GRADING FOR MORE DETAILS REGARDING DEFINITIONS. NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: gradla5
variable.comment: THIS ASSUMES AT LEAST ONE DIGITAL IMAGE OF THE LEFT EYE.0=All fields gradable; 1=Disc ungradable; 2=Portion of macula ungradable; 4= Portion of disc and macula ungradable; 5=Disc and macula ungradable; 6= All available fields ungradable. .SEE MESA DIGITAL GRADING MANUAL OF OPERATIONS (MOP) SECTION 5.1.1 QUALITY OF GRADING FOR MORE DETAILS REGARDING DEFINITIONS. NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f1grdra5
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 1; . NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f1grdla5
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 1;. NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f2grdra5
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 2;. NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: f2grdla5
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 2; . NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: reta5
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED SEVERITY LEVELS ARE DESCRIBED IN MORE DETAIL IN MESA MOP SECTION 5.2.2 RETINOPATHY SUBSECTION. HEX=hard exudates; SE=soft exudate; IRMA=intraretinal microvascular abnormalities; VL=venous loops; MAS=Microaneurysms; HEM=hemorrhages; NPR=Non-proliferative retinopathy; RET=retinopathy; PRP LASER =panretinal photocoagulation scars present; PR=proliferative retinopathy; HRC=high risk characteristics as defined in the Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study; and VH= vitreous hemorrhage. NOTE: RETINOPATHY IS GRADED MASKED TO DIABETES STATUS AND RETINOPATHY MAY BE FOUND IN PERSONS WITH AND WITHOUT DIABETES (EVEN THOUGH VALUE LABELS MAY INDICATE OTHERWISE). LEVEL 12 IS INDICATED WHEN SPECIFIC NONDIABETIC DISEASE E.G. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION, IS PRESENTTO EXAMINE RETINOPATHY IN PERSONS WITH DIABETES USE MESA DIABETES DEFINITION;TO EXAMINE IN NONDIABETIC PERSONS EXCLUDE ALL PERSONS WITH DIABETES. THIS 17 STEP SCALE IS RARELY USED IN CROSS-SECTIONAL ANALYSES. SEE AM J OPHTHALMOL 2006; 141:446-455 AND REFERENCES 29,30 IN THAT PAPER FOR MORE DETAIL ON SEVERITY SCALE USED IN MESA.COULD BE A PHENOTYPE BUT REVIEW REST OF DATASET FIRST TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: MAY BE COLLAPSED TO 4 LEVELS OR TO ANY vs. NONE (SEE OTHER RETINOPATHY VARIABLES IN THE DATSET BELOW, retca5 and anyreta5).
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retra5
variable.comment: SEE VARIABLE reta5 SEE VARIABLE reta5.
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retla5
variable.comment: SEE VARIABLE reta5 SEE VARIABLE reta5.
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retca5
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED AS FOLLOWS FROM 'reta5' VARIABLE: 1=LEVELS 10-13; 2=LEVELS 14-31; 3=LEVELS 41-51; 4=LEVELS 60-80. THIS VARIABLE IS OFTEN USED IN EXAMINING ASSOCIATIONS WITH RETINOPATHY SEVERITY. COULD BE A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: TO COLLAPSE FURTHER 1=NO RETINOPATHY; 2-4= RETINOPATHY;FOR A NO PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY vs. PROLIFERATIVE ANALYSIS, COMBINE 1-3 AS NON-PROLIFERATIVE.

variable.name: anyrta5
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED AS FOLLOWS FROM 'reta5' VARIABLE: 0=LEVELS <14; 1=LEVELS >=14.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: hmaa5
variable.comment: THIS SUMMARY VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ON DESCRIBING MAS ONLY AND BLOT HEMORRHAGES ONLY OR BOTH WITH TWO SEVERITY LEVELS USING ETDRS STUDY STANDARD 2A. (value 5 is more severe than value 4) FOR PURE MAS (ONLY) PHENOTYPE - SEE VARIABLE 'MAA5' FOR PURE HEM (ONLY) - A DIFFERENT PHENOTYPE - SEE 'HEMA5'.COMBINED HEM AND/OR MAS PHENOTYPE WOULD INCLUDE VALUES 2 to 5 AS PRESENT, VALUES 0 & 1 WOULD BE NONE. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) ;

variable.name: maa5
variable.comment: THIS VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ONLY ON EYES WITH RETINAL MICROANEURYSMS AND NO RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGE. IT IS COMPUTED AS BEING PRESENT (1=YES) IF VARIABLE 'HMAA5' =2 AND ABSENT (0=NO) IF 'HMAA5' =0 OR 1. IS A PHENOTYPETO GET AT EYES WITH ANY MICROANEURYSMS, RECODE FROM 'HMAA5'.

variable.name: hema5
variable.description: RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES (HEM) (NO MAS) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: THIS VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ONLY ON EYES WITH RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES AND NO MICROANEURYSMS . IT IS COMPUTED 1 (PRESENT) FROM HMA VARIABLE CODE =3 AND 0 (ABSENT) FROM HMA VARIABLE CODE =0 OR 1IS A PHENOTYPETO GET AT EYES WITH ANY RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES, RECODE FROM 'HMAA5'.

variable.name: hemra5
variable.description: RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES (HEM) (NO MAS) RIGHT EYE

variable.name: hemla5
variable.description: RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES (HEM) (NO MAS) LEFT EYE

variable.name: hea5
variable.comment: HARD EXUDATE IS A RESULT OF LIPOPROTEIN DEPOSITION IN RETINA AND IS USUALLY ASSOCIATED WITH MACULAR EDEMA;IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE).

variable.name: sea5
variable.comment: SOFT EXUDATE, SOMETIMES CALLED COTTON WOOL SPOT, IS DUE TO RETINAL NERVE FIBER LAYER INFARCTION - A RESULT OF RETINAL ISCHEMIA. IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE).

variable.name: irmaa5
variable.comment: IRMA ARE RETINAL COLLATERAL VESSELS IN AREAS OF RETINAL ISCHEMIA INDICATING A MORE SEVERE LEVEL OF RETINOPATHY. 8A IS A PHOTO STANDARD FROM ETDRS STUDY: EYES WITH IRMA >= 8A HAVE MORE SEVERE DISEASE THAN EYES WITH STD<8A.; IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 and 1 for FOR IRMA ABSENT AND 2 and 3 FOR IRMA PRESENT.

variable.name: vba5
variable.comment: VENOUS BEADING IS A MANIFESTATION OF SEVERE RETINAL ISCHEMIA; IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE).

variable.name: nvda5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ON DISC WORSE EYE
variable.comment: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ON THE OPTIC DISC ARE A MANIFESTATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; 10A IS A PHOTO STANDARD FROM ETDRS STUDY; EYES WITH STD > 10A HAVE MORE NEW VESSELS THAN EYES WITH STD <10AWHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca5=4' .IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) FOR ABSENT; 2 WITH 3 (< 10A WITH >= 10A) FOR PRESENT;

variable.name: nvdra5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ON DISC RIGHT EYE

variable.name: nvdla5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ON DISC LEFT EYE

variable.name: nvea5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ELSEWHERE WORSE EYE
variable.comment: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ELSEWHERE OUTSIDE THE OPTIC DISC MARGIN ARE ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE MORE SEVERE THE DISEASEWHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca5=4' ).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) FOR ABSENT and 2 (< 1/2 DISC AREA) WITH 3 (>= 1/2 DISC AREA) FOR PRESENT.

variable.name: nvera5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ELSEWHERE RIGHT EYE

variable.name: nvela5
variable.description: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ELSEWHERE LEFT EYE

variable.name: fpa5
variable.comment: RETINAL FIBROUS PROLIFERATION IS ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE GREATER THE DISEASE; FPD = fibrous proliferation within the optic disc area; FPE = fibrous profileration elsewhere outside the optic disc margin. WHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca5=4' ).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; 2 (FPD ONLY), 3 (FPE ONLY) AND 4 (FPD AND FPE) FOR ANY FP PRESENT.

variable.name: prhvha5
variable.description: PRERETINAL HEMORRHAGE OR VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE WORSE EYE
variable.comment: PRERETINAL HEMORRHAGE OR VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE IS ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE MORE SEVERE THE DISEASE .WHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca5=4' ).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT AND 2 (<1 DA) AND 3 (> 1 DA) FOR PRESENT.

variable.name: prhvhra5
variable.description: PRERETINAL HEMORRHAGE OR VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE RIGHT EYE

variable.name: prhvhla5
variable.description: PRERETINAL HEMORRHAGE OR VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE LEFT EYE

variable.name: mea5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA BY CLINICAL SIGNIFICANCE WORSE EYE
variable.comment: INCREASED PERMEABILITY OF RETINAL CAPILLARIES AND MAS MAY RESULT IN ACCUMULATION OF EXTRACELLULAR FLUID AND THICKENING OF NORMALLY COMPACT RETINAL TISSUE CALLED MACULAR EDEMA. IN SOME CASE, THE MACULAR EDEMA BECOMES CLINICALLY SIGNIFICANT. SEE MESA MOP PAGE 17 FOR DEFINITION OF CLINICALLY SIGNIFICANT MACULA EDEMA (CSME). "OTHER" REFERS TO EVIDENCE OF MACULA EDEMA ASSOCIATED WITH RETINOPATHY OFTEN ASSOCIATED WITH A SPECIFIC OCULAR OR SYSTEMIC CONDITION (e.g. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; AND 2 (YES, BUT NOT CSME) and=3 FOR ANY MACULAR EDEMA PRESENT; EXCLUDE 7 FROM ANALYSIS.

variable.name: mera5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA BY CLINICAL SIGNIFICANCE RIGHT EYE

variable.name: mela5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA BY CLINICAL SIGNIFICANCE LEFT EYE

variable.name: mectra5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER WORSE EYE
variable.comment: CENTER INVOLVEMENT SPECIFIES INVOLVEMENT OF FOVEA BY MACULAR EDEMA; CYSTS INDICATE MORE SEVERE INVOLVEMENT USUALLY ASSOCIATED WITH VISUAL LOSS (CAN CHECK VISUAL ACUITY DATA IN CORRESPONDING EYE). "OTHER" REFERS TO EVIDENCE OF MACULA EDEMA ASSOCIATED WITH RETINOPATHY OFTEN ASSOCIATED WITH A SPECIFIC OCULAR OR SYSTEMIC CONDITION (e.g. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION).IS A RARE PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) and 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; 2 (PR AND CSME) AND 3 (CSME WITH CYSTS) FOR ANY PRESENT CENTRAL INVOLVEMENT; EXCLUDE 7 FROM THE ANALYSIS.

variable.name: mectrra5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER RIGHT EYE

variable.name: mectrla5
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER LEFT EYE

variable.name: pcscra5
variable.comment: PANRETINAL PHOTOCOAGULATION IN A SCATTER PATTERN ACROSS THE RETINA OR IN SPECIFIC AREAS OUTSIDE MACULAR AREA LATER RESULTS IN SCARRING AND IS A SURROGATE FOR HAVING HAD ACTIVE SEVERE DISEASE. LOCAL AND/OR SCATTER PHOTOCOAGULATION IS USUALLY DONE TO PREVENT PRERETINAL AND VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE OR THE DEVELOPMENT OF RETINAL NEW VESSELS;IN ABSENCE OF RETINOPATHY IS USUALLY COMBINED WITH OTHER SIGNS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY WHICH MAY OR MAY NOT BE PRESENT (SEE VARIABLE 'RETA5';) IS NOT A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINIE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE/INCOMPLETE) FOR ABSENT; 2, 3 AND 4 AS PRESENT.

variable.name: focrxa5
variable.description: FOCAL PHOTOCOAGULATION SCARS FOR MACULAR EDEMA WORSE EYE
variable.comment: FOCAL LASER PHOTOCOAGULATION, EITHER AS TREATMENT OF LEAKING RETINAL MICROANEURYSMS (MA Rx ONLY) OR IN A GRID PATTERN IN MACULA IS DONE FOR THE TREATMENT OF LOCALIZED OR DIFFUSE MACULAR EDEMA (GRID ONLY Rx), OR SOMETIMES OBSERVED TOGETHER.IT IS NOT A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: SUGGEST COMBINE 0+1 FOR ABSENT AND 2-4 FOR PRESENT FOR ANALYSES.

variable.name: focrxra5
variable.description: FOCAL PHOTOCOAGULATION SCARS FOR MACULAR EDEMA RIGHT EYE

variable.name: focrxla5
variable.description: FOCAL PHOTOCOAGULATION SCARS FOR MACULAR EDEMA LEFT EYE

variable.name: arma5
variable.comment: AMD IS CATEGORIZED HERE BY 3-LEVELS OF SEVERITY. EARLY AMD IS DEFINED BY PRESENCE OF DRUSEN AND/OR PIGMENTARY ABNORMALITIES; LATE AMD BY EXUDATIVE AMD SIGNS AND/OR GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY. FURTHER INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND IN MESA PROTOCOL SECTION 5.1.2 AND OPHTHALMOLOGY 2006;1113:373-380. IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: FOR ANY AMD VARIABLE. COMBINE 1 (EARLY) and 2 (LATE) categories.

variable.name: rpaba5
variable.description: RETINAL AMD PIGMENTARY ABNORMALITIES WORSE EYE
variable.comment: INCREASED RETINAL PIGMENTAND/OR RPE DEPIGMENTATION IS A MANIFESTATION OF EARLY AMD IN ABSENCE OF SIGNS OF LATE AMD.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: rpabra5
variable.description: RETINAL AMD PIGMENTARY ABNORMALITIES RIGHT EYE

variable.name: rpabla5
variable.description: RETINAL AMD PIGMENTARY ABNORMALITIES LEFT EYE

variable.name: larma5
variable.description: LATE AGE-RELATED MACULAR DEGENERATION WORSE EYE
variable.comment: LATE AMD IS DEFINED BY PRESENCE OF SIGNS OF EXUDATIVE AMD AND/OR GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: larmra5
variable.description: LATE AGE-RELATED MACULAR DEGENERATION RIGHT EYE

variable.name: larmla5
variable.description: LATE AGE-RELATED MACULAR DEGENERATION LEFT EYE

variable.name: pgaa5
variable.comment: GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY IN THE ABSENCE OF SIGNS OF EXUDATIVE AMD.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: exuda5
variable.comment: ALSO CALLED NEOVASCULAR AMD. SOMETIMES GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY IS PRESENT. INFREQUENT IN MESA.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: armexra5
variable.comment: AMD MAY NOT BE ASCERTAINED FOR MANY REASONS (SEE VARIABLE 'armexroda5' . NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: rarmxra5
variable.description: REASON FOR AMD EXCLUSION RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: LISTS REASONS E.G. TRAUMA, LASER TREATMENT, RETINAL VESSEL OCCLUSION, RETINAL DYSTROPHY, MYOPIC DEGENERATION, PRESUMED OCULAR HISTOPLASMOSIS OR CHORIORETINAL TOXOPLASMOSIS SCAR, NONSPECIFIC INFLAMMATORY RETINAL LESION, RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY (ROP), NON AMD RETINAL PIGMENT EPITHELIAL ABNORMALITY, NON AMD DETACHMENT, UNKNOWN, OTHER [USUALLY FOUND IN COMMENT SECTION OF DETAIL GRADING] AND/OR A RETINAL COLOBOMA OR STAPHYLOMA.IS NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: rarmxla5
variable.description: REASON FOR AMD EXCLUSION LEFT EYE

variable.name: hda5
variable.comment: MEASURED ONLY IN ABOUT 50% OF MESA SUBJECTS. CURRENTLY CONSIDERED, BY ITSELF, NOT TO BE A SIGN OF AMD.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: dr125a5
variable.description: LARGE DRUSEN >=125UM IN DIAMETER WORSE EYE
variable.comment: LARGE DRUSEN ARE CONSIDERED A SIGN OF EARLY AMD.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: dr125ra5
variable.description: LARGE DRUSEN >=125UM IN DIAMETER RIGHT EYE

variable.name: dr125la5
variable.description: LARGE DRUSEN >=125UM IN DIAMETER LEFT EYE

variable.name: dr500a5
variable.comment: LARGE DRUSEN COVERING MORE AREA INDICATES MORE INVOLVEMENT IN MACULA AREA. IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: softa5
variable.comment: PRESENCE OF ANY SOFT INDISTINCT AND/OR SOFT DISTINCT DRUSEN.IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: softda5
variable.comment: LESS SEVERE TYPE OF DRUSEN THAN SOFT INDISTINCT DRUSENIS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: softia5
variable.comment: MORE SEVERE TYPE OF DRUSEN THAN SOFT DISTINCT DRUSENIS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: incpa5
variable.description: INCREASED RETINAL PIGMENT DUE TO AMD WORSE EYE

variable.name: incpra5
variable.description: INCREASED RETINAL PIGMENT DUE TO AMD RIGHT EYE

variable.name: incpla5
variable.description: INCREASED RETINAL PIGMENT DUE TO AMD LEFT EYE

variable.name: rpea5
variable.description: RPE DEPIGMENTATION DUE TO AMD WORSE EYE

variable.name: rpera5
variable.description: RPE DEPIGMENTATION DUE TO AMD RIGHT EYE

variable.name: rpela5
variable.description: RPE DEPIGMENTATION DUE TO AMD LEFT EYE

variable.name: geoata5
variable.comment: DIFFERS FROM PURE GA VARIABL E ('PGAA5'_ BECAUSE EXUDATIVE AMD MAY BE PRESENT CONCURRENTLY IN WHICH CASE GA MAY RESULT FROM EXUDATIVE AMD AND/OR IT'S TREATMENT. SHOULD USE PURE GA AS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: pedrda5
variable.description: RETINAL PIGMENT EPITHELIAL DETACHMENT/SENSORY RETINAL DETACHMENT WORSE EYE
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD. IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: pedrdra5
variable.description: RETINAL PIGMENT EPITHELIAL DETACHMENT/SENSORY RETINAL DETACHMENT RIGHT EYE

variable.name: pedrdla5
variable.description: RETINAL PIGMENT EPITHELIAL DETACHMENT/SENSORY RETINAL DETACHMENT LEFT EYE

variable.name: srnva5
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: srhema5
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMDIS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: fibsca5
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: armrxa5
variable.description: LASER/PHOTODYNAMIC/THERMAL TREATMENT FOR AMD WORSE EYE
variable.comment: 3 TYPES OF TREATMENT FOR EXUDATIVE AMD. INDICATES PRESENCE OF LATE AMD. CAN CONSIDER COMBINING WITH EXUDATIVE AMD (VARIABLE 'EXUDA5').IS NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: armrxra5
variable.description: LASER/PHOTODYNAMIC/THERMAL TREATMENT FOR AMD RIGHT EYE

variable.name: armrxla5
variable.description: LASER/PHOTODYNAMIC/THERMAL TREATMENT FOR AMD LEFT EYE

variable.name: baoa5
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL ARTERIOLE OR ARTERY RESULTING IN INFARCTION OF RETINA.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: bvoa5
variable.description: RETINAL BRANCH VEIN OCCLUSION (RBVO) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL BRANCH VENULE.[LEVEL 12 IN RETINOPATHY SEVERITY SCALE VARIABLE 'reta5']; CAN COMBINE WITH RETINAL CENTRAL VEIN OCCLUSION (variable Cvoa5)' TO GET RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: bvora5
variable.description: RETINAL BRANCH VEIN OCCLUSION (RBVO) RIGHT EYE

variable.name: bvola5
variable.description: RETINAL BRANCH VEIN OCCLUSION (RBVO) LEFT EYE

variable.name: cvoa5
variable.description: RETINAL CENTRAL VEIN OCCLUSION (RVCO) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL CENTAL VEIN. [LEVEL 12 IN RETINOPATHY SEVERITY SCALE VARIABLE 'reta5']; CAN COMBINE WITH RETINAL BLANCH VEIN OCCULSION (variable 'bvoa5') TO GET RETINAL VEIN OCCUSION (RVO).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: cvora5
variable.description: RETINAL CENTRAL VEIN OCCLUSION (RVCO) RIGHT EYE

variable.name: cvola5
variable.description: RETINAL CENTRAL VEIN OCCLUSION (RVCO) LEFT EYE

variable.name: avna5
variable.comment: SEE MESA GRADING MOP SECTION 5.2.3 FOR MORE DETAILS.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: focna5
variable.description: RETINAL FOCUAL ATERIOLAR NARROWING WORSE EYE
variable.comment: MAY BE SECONDARY TO HYPERTENSION;SEE MESA GRADING MOP SECTION 5.2.3 FOR MORE DETAILS.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: focnra5
variable.description: RETINAL FOCUAL ATERIOLAR NARROWING RIGHT EYE

variable.name: focnla5
variable.description: RETINAL FOCUAL ATERIOLAR NARROWING LEFT EYE

variable.name: holla5
variable.description: RETINAL ARTERIOLAR EMBOLUS (HOLLENHORST PLAQUE) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: USUALLY FIBRIN OR CHOLESTEROL EMBOLUS SEEN IN RETINAL ARTERIOLES. OFTEN AT A BIFURCATION OF THE VESSEL.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: hollra5
variable.description: RETINAL ARTERIOLAR EMBOLUS (HOLLENHORST PLAQUE) RIGHT EYE

variable.name: hollla5
variable.description: RETINAL ARTERIOLAR EMBOLUS (HOLLENHORST PLAQUE) LEFT EYE

variable.name: perata5
variable.comment: DEFINED AS RETINAL-CHOROIDAL ATROPHIC AREA AROUND DISC.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: astera5
variable.comment: SOAP-LIKE CRYSTALS FLOATING IN VITREOUS CAVITY IN FRONT OF RETINA. CAN OBSTRUCT VIEW OF RETINAL LESIONS.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: chaba5
variable.comment: OFTEN A NONSPECIFIC SCAR. CAN BE FROM OLD TRAUMA, INFLAMMATION, OR MORE OFTEN, OF UNKNOWN ETIOLOGY. NOT A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: lrgcda5
variable.comment: MAY BE A MARKER OF GLAUCOMA BUT CAN BE FOUND IN NORMAL EYES. DIFFICULT TO GRADE WHEN (AS WAS THE CASE IN MESA) IMAGES OF AN EYE ARE NOT TAKEN IN STEREO.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: mholea5
variable.comment: ROUND SHARPLY DEFINED HOLE INVOLVING CENTER OF MACULA RESULTING IN DECREASE IN VISUAL ACUITY (CHECK VISUAL ACUITY DATA).IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT.

variable.name: nevusa5
variable.comment: LOCALIZED INCREASE IN NUMBER OF PIGMENT BEARING CELLS IN CHOROID USUALLY ROUND OR OVAL IN SHAPE.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: otrxa5
variable.comment: NOT A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: pohsa5
variable.description: PRESUMED OCULAR HISTOPLASMOSIS SYNDROME WORSE EYE
variable.comment: USUALLY MANIFEST BY PERIPAPILLARY ATROPHIC SCARS, FOCAL ROUND CHORIORETINAL ACTIVE LESIONS OR PUNCHED OUT SCARS.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: pohsra5
variable.description: PRESUMED OCULAR HISTOPLASMOSIS SYNDROME RIGHT EYE

variable.name: pohsla5
variable.description: PRESUMED OCULAR HISTOPLASMOSIS SYNDROME LEFT EYE

variable.name: rdeta5
variable.comment: RARE IN MESAIS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: swrca5
variable.comment: A PATCH OR PATCHES OF IRREGULAR INCREASED REFLECTION ON INNER SURFACE OF RETINA DUE TO MEMBRANE. CELLOPHANE CHANGES ONLY WITH NO TRACTION. CAN COMBINE WITH EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE (TRACTION CHANGES) variable 'swrta5'.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: swrta5
variable.description: EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE (RETINAL TRACTION CHANGES) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: A PATCH OR PATCHES OF IRREGULAR INCREASED REFLECTION ON INNER SURFACE OF RETINA DUE TO RETINAL TRACTION CHANGES OF MEMBRANE;CAN COMBINE WITH EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE CELLOPHANE CHANGES, variable 'swrca5'.IS A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE)TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT.

variable.name: swrtra5
variable.description: EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE (RETINAL TRACTION CHANGES) RIGHT EYE

variable.name: swrtla5
variable.description: EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE (RETINAL TRACTION CHANGES) LEFT EYE

variable.name: craea5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL ARTERY EQUIVALENT - WORSE EYE
variable.comment: NOTE: NOT A TRUE MEAN. IF ONE EYE WAS MISSING THEN CRAEA5 IS EQUAL TO THE NON-MISSING EYE. ONLY ABOUT 1000 LEFT EYES WERE READ IN MESA.See Comments for variables 'vmfocra5' and 'ungrra5'.IS A PHENOTYPE.SEE INVEST OPHTHALMOL VIS SCI 2006;47:2341-2350

variable.name: craera5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL ARTERY EQUIVALENT - RIGHT EYE

variable.name: craela5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL ARTERY EQUIVALENT - LEFT EYE

variable.name: crvea5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL VEIN EQUIVALENT - WORSE EYE
variable.comment: NOTE: NOT A TRUE MEAN. IF ONE EYE WAS MISSING THEN CRVEA5 IS EQUAL TO THE NON-MISSING EYE. ONLY ABOUT 1000 LEFT EYES WERE READ IN MESA.See Comments for variables 'vmfocra5' and 'ungrva5'.IS A PHENOTYPE .SEE INVEST OPHTHALMOL VIS SCI 2006;47:2341-2350

variable.name: crvera5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL VEIN EQUIVALENT - RIGHT EYE

variable.name: crvela5
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL VEIN EQUIVALENT - LEFT EYE

variable.name: vmfocra5
variable.description: RETINAL VESSEL MEASUREMENT AFFECTED BY POOR FOCUS RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRAE OR CRVE;Variables (craea5 and crvea5).NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: vmfocla5
variable.description: RETINAL VESSEL MEASUREMENT AFFECTED BY POOR FOCUS LEFT EYE

variable.name: ungara5
variable.description: UNGRADABLE LARGE RETINAL ARTERIOLE RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRAE;VARIABLES (craea5, craera5 and craela5).IS NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: ungala5
variable.description: UNGRADABLE LARGE RETINAL ARTERIOLE LEFT EYE

variable.name: ungvra5
variable.description: UNGRADABLE LARGE RETINAL VENULE RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRVEVARIABLES (crvea5, crvera5 and crvela5)IS NOT A PHENOTYPE

variable.name: ungvla5
variable.description: UNGRADABLE LARGE RETINAL VENULE LEFT EYE

variable.name: othera5
variable.comment: REFERS TO RETINAL ABNORMALITIES NOT LISTED IN ANY OTHER VARIABLE IN THIS DATASET. Value 3 is more severe than value 2 and may be more likely to impact on vision (check vision acuity data).IS NOT A PHENOTYPE TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 2 (Yes) and 3 (Yes, in center) for present.
